https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Fc8T0J1Q1iSCscfwzGkwbHI6h1.jpg Two friends are overcome with the spirit of the samurai warrior after unearthing a pair of mythical swords in this over-the-top action effort directed by freshman filmmaker Aaron Yamasato and featuring special makeup effects by Screaming Mad George. Blood of the Samurai
